mapper.update: UPDATE RoutineBoard SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_uri = #{fileUri}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT num, title, writer, content, file_name, file_uri, view_cnt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date FROM RoutineBoard WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT num, title, writer, content, file_name, file_uri, view_cnt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date FROM RoutineBoard WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE '%${keyword}%'
